name: isomorphic-react
description: Exports window.React if available, otherwise, exports require('react').

scripts.build: npm run build:babel && npm run build:webpack
scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev && npm run bump:auditfix
scripts.bump:dev: if [ `cat package.json | jq -r '.devDependencies | length'` -ne 0 ]; then npm install --legacy-peer-deps $(cat package.json | jq -r '((.devDependencies // {}) | keys) - ((.skipBump // {}) | keys) | .[]' | awk '{print $1 "@latest"}'); fi
scripts.bump:prod: if [ `cat package.json | jq -r '.dependencies | length'` -ne 0 ]; then npm install --legacy-peer-deps --save-exact $(cat package.json | jq -r '((.dependencies // {}) | keys) - ((.skipBump // {}) | keys) | .[]' | awk '{print $1 "@latest"}'); fi
scripts.postbump: cat package.json | jq '. + (.dependencies = ((.dependencies + (.localPeerDependencies // {})) | to_entries | sort_by(.key) | from_entries)) | (.devDependencies = ((.devDependencies + (.localPeerDevDependencies // {})) | to_entries | sort_by(.key) | from_entries))' > package-temp.json && mv package-temp.json package.json
scripts.prebump: cat package.json | jq '(((.localPeerDependencies // {}) | keys | map(["dependencies", .])) + ((.localPeerDevDependencies // {}) | keys | map(["devDependencies", .]))) as $localPeerPaths | delpaths($localPeerPaths)' > package-temp.json && mv package-temp.json package.json
scripts.start: npm run start:note && npm run start:babel && npm run start:webpack
scripts.start:note: echo "isomorphic-react is not under active development; running in non-watch mode."
